snippet: The Ritz-Carlton opened its ultra-luxury Dorado Beach resort last week, hoping to lure big spenders to a stretch of sand where Hollywood stars once roamed.
abstract: Opulent Ritz-Carlton Reserve resort, at Dorado Beach, hopes to overcome Puerto Rico's gritty image and draw ultra-rich tourists by evoking glamour of the 1920s.
lead_paragraph: The Ritz-Carlton opened its ultra-luxury Dorado Beach resort last week, hoping to lure big spenders to a stretch of sand where Hollywood stars once roamed.

headline.seo: A Ritz Ups the Ante in Puerto Rico
headline.main: A Ritz Ups the Ante in Puerto Rico
headline.print_headline: Upping the Ante in Puerto Rico
